summary:
The Rally Has Begun! - Get unforgettable impressions from this year’s XMas Santa Rally.

Buy $XMRY

Enjoy the Rally Game

Christmas Event for the Whole Market Members

A Santa Claus Rally is the sustained increase in the stock and crypto market
that occurs around the Christmas holidays. Most estimate these rallies happen
in the week leading up to the Christmas holiday, while others see trends that
begin Christmas Day through first days of January.
